text: kesetochi፣ kewenidochi lijochimi፣ kewerik’ina kebiri፣ ketekamechu genizebochimi፣ ketesemaru feresochimi፣ kegimeli kekebitina kefiyelimi፣ ke’azimerami yehonu filagotochini mewidedi lesewochi tesheleme፡፡ yihi hulu yek’iribitu hiyiweti met’ek’emiya newi፡፡ alahimi irisu zenidi melikami memelesha (geneti) ale፡፡
